    public static final class Collider.LineCollider
extends Collider

    • Method Detail

      • collidesWith

        public Collider.CollisionStatus collidesWith(Collider c)
        Description copied from class: Collider
        The universal collider is special, and is assumed to be a special case. It should probably never be used.
        Specified by:
        collidesWith in class Collider
        Parameters:
        c - The collider to check collision with.
        Returns:
        The result of a collision check.
